## Ingredients

### Wet

* 2 cups white sugar
* 1/2 cup milk
* 1/2 cup butter, margarine, or shortening
* 1 tsp vanilla

### Dry

* 3 cups quick cooking rolled oats (not instant)
* 1/2 cup coconut
* 6 Tbsp cocoa

## Directions

* Put [wet](#wet) ingredients in a medium or larger saucepan.
* Heat on medium.
* While heating, combine [dry](#dry) ingredients in a bowl.
* Just bring to a boil, then reduce heat to minimum, and boil for 5 minutes.
* Remove from heat, thoroughly mix in dry ingredients.
* Let sit for 10 minutes.
* Turn out spoonfuls of mix onto a baking sheet lined with wax or parchment paper.
* Cool in a refrigerator for 20 minutes.
* Transfer to a sealed container.

Modified from [My Island Bistro Kitchen](https://myislandbistrokitchen.com/2013/06/30/june-2013-cookie-of-the-month-spider-cookies/)
